data.eml:eml: Notes on South American Dasyomma, with the description of a remarkable new species from Chile (Diptera: Athericidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Woodley, Norman E. (2007): Notes on South American Dasyomma, with the description of a remarkable new species from Chile (Diptera: Athericidae). Zootaxa 1443: 29-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176051
